effect.name: Dual Glow
effect.description: Apply an inner and outer glow to the image.
effect.author: Looki

parameter.name: Outer radius
parameter.description: Radius of the glow in pixels.

parameter.name: Outer exponent
parameter.description: The higher, the sharper the glow will be.

parameter.name: Outer alpha
parameter.description: The alpha coefficient of the glow.

parameter.name: Inner radius
parameter.description: Radius of the glow in pixels.

parameter.name: Inner exponent
parameter.description: The higher, the sharper the glow will be.
